statements: DELETE FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE network_name = 'DataCenter1' AND bandwidth_mbps > 100
DELETE FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE id = 10 AND metric_name = 'Latency';
DELETE FROM capacity_planning WHERE server_name = 'Server1' AND capacity_threshold < 0.5;
DELETE FROM network_performance_data WHERE latency > 100 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM capacity_planning WHERE site_id = 5 AND request_timestamp < '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM network_traffic WHERE traffic_volume > 10000 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
